Description: Fragment of oval handle from neck join to sharpish turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine red-buff; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Name Philodamos. From the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0244.14.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (218)
